com.localytics.android

Class InAppConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localytics.android.InAppConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class InAppConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    An object designed to contain all mutable display state of an in-app message. An in-app configuration object is passed to the user through the MessagingListenerV2.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        android.os.Parcelable.ClassLoaderCreator<T>, android.os.Parcelable.Creator<T>

      • isCenterCampaign

        public boolean isCenterCampaign()
        Get whether the in-app will be presented as a center campaign.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the in-app is a center campaign

      • isTopBannerCampaign

        Get whether the in-app will be presented as a top banner campaign.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the in-app is a top banner campaign

        Get whether the in-app will be presented as a bottom banner campaign.

        public boolean isFullScreenCampaign()
        Get whether the in-app will be presented as a full screen campaign.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the in-app is a full screen campaign

      • setAspectRatio

        public void setAspectRatio(float aspectRatio)
        Set the aspect ratio for this in-app. The aspect ratio should be a float value representing a ratio of width to height (example 16:9 display is 1.77).

        Accepted values must be greater than 0.

        This property is only relevant for center in-app Campaigns

        Parameters:
        aspectRatio - a float value greater than 0 representing the aspect ratio of the campaign.

      • setBackgroundAlpha

        public void setBackgroundAlpha(float backgroundAlpha)
        Set the background alpha for this in-app. The background alpha should be a float value representing the desired transparency for the backdrop of the creative.

        Accepted values must be greater than 0 and less than 1.

        This property is only relevant for center and full screen in-app Campaigns

        Parameters:
        backgroundAlpha - a float value greater than 0 and less than 1 representing the transparency of the campaign backdrop.

      • setBannerOffsetDps

        public void setBannerOffsetDps(int offsetDps)
        Set the offset for this in-app. The offset should be an int value representing the desired offset from the edge of the screen in density independent pixels.

        This property is only relevant for banner in-app Campaigns

        Parameters:
        offsetDps - an int value representing the offset from the edge of the screen.

      • setDismissButtonLocation

        public void setDismissButtonLocation(Localytics.InAppMessageDismissButtonLocation dismissButtonLocation)
        Set the dismiss button location for this in-app. This value will override any values set globally with Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonLocation(com.localytics.android.Localytics.InAppMessageDismissButtonLocation).
        Parameters:
        dismissButtonLocation - Either InAppMessageDismissButtonLocation.LEFT or InAppMessageDismissButtonLocation.RIGHT

      • setDismissButtonImage

        public void setDismissButtonImage(@NonNull
                                  android.content.res.Resources resources,
                                  @DrawableRes
                                  int id)
        Set the dismiss button image for this in-app. This value will override any values set globally with Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonImage(Resources, int) or Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonImage(Resources, Bitmap).
        Parameters:
        resources - The Resources instance for your application's package.
        id - The image resource id for the close button appearance.

      • setDismissButtonImage

        public void setDismissButtonImage(@NonNull
                                  android.content.res.Resources resources,
                                  @Nullable
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Set the dismiss button image for this in-app. This value will override any values set globally with Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonImage(Resources, int) or Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonImage(Resources, Bitmap).
        Parameters:
        resources - The Resources instance for your application's package.
        image - The bitmap object for the close button appearance.

      • setDismissButtonVisibility

        public void setDismissButtonVisibility(int visibility)
        Set the dismiss button image for this in-app. This value will override any values set globally with Localytics.setInAppMessageDismissButtonVisibility(int).
        Parameters:
        visibility - The visibility state of the dismiss button
        See Also:
        View.setVisibility(int)
